item.title: Disable Administrative Share Creation at Startup
item.description: Administrative shares are hidden network shares created by Microsoftâ€™s Windows NT operating systems that grant system administrators remote access to every disk volume on a network-connected system

item.title: Mounted Share Deleted
item.description: Detects when when a mounted share is removed. Adversaries may remove share connections that are no longer useful in order to clean up traces of their operation
